---
--- Generated by EmmyLua(https://github.com/EmmyLua)
--- Created by liuyubao.
--- DateTime: 2021/12/30 16:22
---@class DebugSystem:ISystem
local DebugSystem = SimpleClassUtil:class(ISystem)

function DebugSystem:initialize()
    ISystem.initialize(self)
end

function DebugSystem:getEventHandleMap()
    return {
        [EventType.Event_Battle_Render_Debug_GizmosCircle] = "gizmosCircleHandle",
    }
end

function DebugSystem:gizmosCircleHandle(data)
    local entity = self:getEntityByUid(data.uid)
    local volume_r = data.volume_r or 0
    local place_r = data.place_r or 0
    local dislocation_r = data.dislocation_r or 0
    local detection_r = data.detection_r or 0
    local attack_r = data.attack_r or 0
    local place_r_base = data.place_r_base or 0
    if entity  then
        entity:setGizmosCircle(volume_r,place_r,dislocation_r,detection_r,attack_r,place_r_base)
    end
end


return DebugSystem
